page.title: 11Amenities
page.content: Whitburn, being a large village, has several amenities. These fall into two broad categories - standard amenities and social amenities. The social amenities cater for all age-groups and attract visitors as well as residents to participate. The Community Association, based on the campus of Whitburn Comprehensive School, offers an increasing number of sporting activities, such as yoga, dancing, keep fit, swimming, gymnastics, squash etc. There are also vocational classes - craft, computer studies, etc., as well as a coffee bar, where people can socialise. The Barnes Institute, dating back to 1904, is similar to a village hall, in that it is a centre for choirs, dances, and sales, and a local senior citizens' club.
